metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27803 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was discovered in how p2p/p2p_pd.c in wpa_supplicant before2.10 processes P2P (Wi-Fi Direct) provision discovery requests. It couldresult in denial of service or other impact (potentially execution ofarbitrary code), for an attacker within radio range.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-27803` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hostapd - 2:2.9-1ubuntu4.3
wpagui - 2:2.9-1ubuntu4.3
wpasupplicant - 2:2.9-1ubuntu4.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wpa package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.9-1ubuntu4.3').
